description: Barberry (Berberis mentorensis) is an amazing evergreen plant with beautiful, bright green foliage that brightens up any garden. It produces colorful flowers followed by red berries that attract birds. The plant prefers full sun and well drained soil and that makes it versatile and easy to grow. The foliage and twigs are also evergreen, keeping the garden bright year round. Barberry is also known for its medicinal properties, making it not only a stunning garden plant, but a useful one as well. Overall, barberry is a perfect choice for any garden, providing year round beauty, color, and even helpful medicinal benefits.
